Home.About us: We are a team of developers who created a lightweight and user-friendly application for working with REST APIs. Our goal is to make the process of testing requests simple, clear, and efficient!

Our app.1: - Choose HTTP methods and send requests to any URL;
Our app.2: - Edit request bodies with formatting and base64 encoding support;
Our app.3: - Add headers and variables to your requests;
Our app.4: - View server responses along with HTTP status codes;
Our app.5: - Access your request history to easily restore and reuse past queries;

Home.School info: This project was developed during our studies at Rolling Scopes School - a community-driven educational initiative that has been helping both beginners and experienced developers grow and gain hands-on skills since 2013.
